p: Thirty‐eight retrospective cases were collected from June 2017 to March 2018. Dogs undergoing a thoracic or lumbar hemilaminectomy for IVDD correction, that received a NSAID post‐operatively, NOCITA® on the epaxial muscles during surgical closure, and a 0.5mg/kg/hour ketamine CRI for 24 hours were collected. Pain score, clinical and neurological examination as well as side effects were documented. Successful pain control with no or minimal opioid rescue therapy and no side effects related to the NOCITA® injection was observed.
